abstract: Citigroup will introduce a new message in the company’s first global brand campaign since it was formed nearly a decade ago.
snippet: Citigroup will introduce a new message in the company’s first global brand campaign since it was formed nearly a decade ago.
lead_paragraph: For years, Citigroup has promised its customers better service and its investors better results. Now, Citigroup is pitching a new message: “Let’s Get It Done.”

headline.main: Citigroup Goes Global in Ad Effort
